name: Fontier -Font Preview Plugin for Easy Digital Downloads
author: Teconce

sections.description:
Add more power to your Easy Digital download Product. Start selling font with the fontier plugin.

Fontier – Font Preview Plugin for Easy Digital Downloads

Built-in font preview features. It will take font from your EDD downloadable file. First, unzip it & create a folder inside WP Upload & Render it from the frontend.
Take a look at the demo: demo preview.

Fontier Options

Fontier Option is available under settings. You will be able to change your desired settings from there.

Easy Digital Downloads is Required For this Plugin
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Where can i find the option

Fontier option will available under settings.

Does it work with any theme?

Absolutely! You need install EDD plugin.
